name: In Re ELECTION OF DEMOCRATIC PARTY COUNTY COMMITTEE POSITIONS, 7TH DISTRICT, BOROUGH OF GLASSPORT. Appeal of Thomas BRADLEY
name_abbreviation: In re Election of Democratic Party County Committee Positions

judges: McDERMOTT, j., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In Re ELECTION OF DEMOCRATIC PARTY COUNTY COMMITTEE POSITIONS, 7TH DISTRICT, BOROUGH OF GLASSPORT. Appeal of Thomas BRADLEY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
McDERMOTT, j., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Falco A. Muscante, Pittsburgh, for appellant.

James E. Scanlon, Director, Mark Wolosik, Deputy Director, Dept. of Elections, Allan J. Opsitnick, Asst. County Sol., Allegheny County Law Dept., Pittsburgh, Ronald J. Brown, Grogan, Graff am, McGinley & Lucchino, P.C., Philadelphia, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
587 A.2d 312
In Re ELECTION OF DEMOCRATIC PARTY COUNTY COMMITTEE POSITIONS, 7TH DISTRICT, BOROUGH OF GLASSPORT. Appeal of Thomas BRADLEY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 7, 1991.
Decided March 21, 1991.
Falco A. Muscante, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
James E. Scanlon, Director, Mark Wolosik, Deputy Director, Dept. of Elections, Allan J. Opsitnick, Asst. County Sol., Allegheny County Law Dept., Pittsburgh, Ronald J. Brown, Grogan, Graff am, McGinley & Lucchino, P.C., Philadelphia, for appellees.
